title: SAP JSON schema for Web Application Manifest File

_version.description: Represents Application Descriptor format version. It is managed by schema owner

start_url.description: Represents the URL that the developer would prefer the user agent load when the user launches the web application

_version.description: Application attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

sourceTemplate.description: Represents the template from which the app was generated

id.description: Represents id of the template from which the app was generated

version.description: Represents the version of the template from which the app was generated

toolsId.description: Represents an Id generated by SAP Fiori tools

id.description: Represents mandatory unique app identifier which must correspond to component 'id/namespace'

type.description: Represents type of an application and can be application or component or library

i18n.description: Represents path inside the app to the properties file containing text symbols for the Descriptor or properties file specific settings (including supportedLocales, fallbackLocale, terminologies and enhanceWith)

supportedLocales.description: Represents the list of supported locales

terminologies.description: Represents terminologies with additional properties files

enhanceWith.description: Represents enhancement of UI5 resource model with additional properties files

bundleUrl.description: Represents the URL for the resource bundle

bundleUrlRelativeTo.description: Indicates whether url is relative to component (default) or manifest

supportedLocales.description: Represents the list of supported locales

terminologies.description: Represents terminologies with additional properties files

enhanceWith.description: Represents enhancement of UI5 resource model with additional properties files

applicationVersion.description: Represents mandatory version of the app

embeds.description: Represents array of relative paths to the nested manifest.json's (mandatory if it contains nested 'manifest.json')

embeddedBy.description: Represents relative path back to the manifest.json of an embedding component or library (mandatory for nested 'manifest.json')

title.description: Represents a title (mandatory); to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

subTitle.description: Represents a subtitle to the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

shortTitle.description: Represents a shorter version of the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

info.description: Represents additional information to the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

description.description: Represents a description; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

dataSources.description: Represents used data sources with a unique key/alias

cdsViews.description: Represents array of directly used CDS views, which only to be added if directly used via INA protocol and not if used via OData service

resources.description: Represents reference to a file (naming convention is resources.json) which contains list with all resources which the app needs

name.description: Represents an alias for the system

openSourceComponents.description: Represents a collection of directly used open source libs (not when used via UI5 capsulation)

provider.description: Represents the name of the provider which owns the application

offline.description: Represents indicator whether the app is running offline. Possible values are true or false (default)

crossNavigation.description: Represents cross navigation for inbound and outbound targets

^[a-zA-Z0-9_\\.\\-]+$.description: Represents unique id of the site

inbounds.description: Represents cross navigation for inbound target

outbounds.description: Describes intents that can be triggered from the application to navigate

_version.description: Represents UI attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

technology.description: Represents UI technology. The possible values are UI5 (default), WDA, NWBC, GUI, URL and WCF

icons.description: Represents icons which used in application

favIcon.description: Represents ICO file to be used inside the browser and for desktop shortcuts

phone.description: Represents 57x57 pixel version for non-retina iPhones

phone@2.description: Represents 114x114 pixel version for non-retina iPhones

tablet.description: Represents 72x72 pixel version for non-retina iPads

tablet@2.description: Represents 144x144 pixel version for non-retina iPads

deviceTypes.description: Represents device types on which application is running. Supported device types are desktop, tablet and phone

supportedThemes.description: The property is Deprecated. Represents array of supported SAP themes such as sap_hcb, sap_bluecrystal

fullWidth.description: Indicates whether app should run in full screen mode: possible values: true or false

_version.description: Represents SAPUI5 attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

resources.description: Represents paths to JavaScript/CSS resources that your app needs (app internal), formerly called '.includes'

componentUsages.description: Represents the explicit usage declaration for UI5 reuse components

dependencies.description: Represents external dependences such as libraries or components, that will be loaded by UI5 Core in the initialization phase of your Component and can be used after it

minUI5Version.description: Represents the minimum version of SAP UI5 that your component requires

libs.description: Represents the id (namespace) of the libraries that should be loaded by UI5 Core to be used in your component

components.description: Represents the id (namespace) of the components that should be loaded by UI5 Core to be used in your component

models.description: Represents models which should be created/destroyed with the life-cycle of the component

resourceRoots.description: Represents relative path to the resource. Only relative path allowed, no '../'

handleValidation.description: Represents the usage of validation handling by MessageManager for this component (enable/disable)

config.description: Represents the static configuration for components

extends.description: Represents the extension of an additional component

minVersion.description: Represents minimal version of the component

contentDensities.description: Represents object with content density modes the app is supporting. Supported density modes are 'cozy' and 'compact'

compact.description: Represents indicator whether compact mode is supported

cozy.description: Represents indicator whether cozy mode is supported

componentName.description: Represents a name of the UI5 component

autoPrefixId.description: Enables the auto prefixing of IDs of ManagedObjects (e.g. Controls) which are created in context of the Component (e.g. createContent invocation)

appVariantId.description: Represents the identifier of an application variant. The value will be calculated and should not be set manually

appVariantIdHierarchy.description: Represents array of appVariantId hierarchy with origin layer and version, calculated attribute and filled automatically during variant merge

layer.description: Represents origin layer of the app variant id

version.description: Represents version of the app variant id

services.description: Represents a list of the services

i18n.description: Setting to define i18n properties of a library. Can either be a boolean, string or object.

oneOf.description: Using a boolean indicates whether the library contains a i18n resource or not.
When using a string an alternative name for the i18n resource can be defined.

bundleUrl.description: Represents the URL for the resource bundle

supportedLocales.description: Represents the list of supported locales

terminologies.description: Represents terminologies with additional properties files

enhanceWith.description: Represents enhancement of UI5 resource bundle with additional properties files

supportedLocales.description: Represents the list of supported locales

terminologies.description: Represents terminologies with additional properties files

enhanceWith.description: Represents enhancement of UI5 resource bundle with additional properties files

css.description: Flag whether the library contains a CSS file or not.

content.description: Represents the content of a library. Content are controls, elements, types and interfaces.

commands.description: Represents a list of UI5 shortcut commands

flexExtensionPointEnabled.description: Represents an indicator whether app variant is flex extension point enabled

flexEnabled.description: Represents an Indicator whether an app is flex enabled
Represents an Indicator whether an app is flex enabled

deviceType.description: Represents device types on which the app is running

desktop.description: Represents indicator whether desktop device is supported, default true

tablet.description: Represents indicator whether tablet device is supported, default true

phone.description: Represents indicator whether phone device is supported, default true

_version.description: Represents attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

uri.description: Represents the uri of the app in the ABAP system

uriNwbc.description: Represents the alternative uri of the app in the ABAP system for starting the application

sap.platform.hcp.title: JSON schema for SAP.PLATFORM.HCP Namespace
sap.platform.hcp.description: Represents HANA Cloud Platform platform specific attributes

_version.description: Represents attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

uri.description: Represents the uri of the app in the HANA Cloud Platform

uriNwbc.description: Represents the alternative uri of the app in the ABAP system for starting the application

providerAccount.description: Represents the provider account of the HTML5 application

appVersion.description: Represents the version of the HTML5 application

multiVersionApp.description: Indicates that HCP application is multi-version enabled

sap.platform.cf.title: JSON schema for SAP.PLATFORM.CF Namespace
sap.platform.cf.description: Represents CF(Cloud Foundry) platform specific attributes

_version.description: Represents attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

oAuthScopes.description: Represents the authorization scope of the application

appHostId.description: Application host id to which the HTML5 app belongs

changedOn.description: Changed on time stamp of the HTML5 app

appVersion.description: Represents the version of the HTML5 application

multiVersionApp.description: Indicates wether an HTML5 application is multi-version enabled

sap.platform.mobilecards.title: JSON schema for SAP.PLATFORM.MOBILECARDS Namespace
sap.platform.mobilecards.description: Represents Mobile Cards platform specific attributes

_version.description: Represents attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

compatible.description: Represents the compatibility of this app with the Mobile Cards platform.

_version.description: Represents attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

registrationIds.description: Represents array of registration ids, i.e. for Fiori apps fiori id(s)

archeType.description: Represents architecture type of an application. The supported types are transactional or analytical or factsheet or reusecomponent or fpmwebdynpro or designstudio

abstract.description: Indicator that app is an abstract (generic) app which may not be used directly, but needs to be specialized in the SAP Fiori launchpad content

cloudDevAdaptationStatus.description: Represents the release status for the developer adaptation in the cloud (relevant for SAP internal only). The supported types are released, deprecated, obsolete, no value means not released

settings.description: Represents global settings for the application controller

pages.description: Represents one ore more pages of an application. UI5 routing is created from the definitions in this section

sap.fe.title: JSON schema for SAP.FE Namespace
sap.fe.description: Represents specific attributes for Fiori Elements

_version.description: Represents attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

type.description: Represents the type of FLP entry. It must be 'application' or 'tile' or 'plugin'

config.description: Represents configuration parameters of the FLP entry

^[a-zA-Z0-9\\_\\.\\-]*$.description: Represents the configuration key and values

origin.description: Represents the original tile and target mapping which resulted in this app

tileId.description: Represents the original tile which resulted in this app

targetMappingId.description: Represents the original target mapping which resulted in this app

_version.description: Represents attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

globalFilterModel.description: Represents the name of global filter OData model, which  contains entities definition that are relevant for global filters

globalFilterEntityType.description: Represents the entity to use as global filter in the smart filter bar control

globalFilterEntitySet.description: Represents the entity set to use as global filter in the smart filter bar control

showBasicSearch.description: Represents a switch to include basic search in the global filters

disableErrorPage.description: Represents a switch to disable the error page shown on load of overview page when no data is retreived from the backend

smartVariantRequired.description: Represents a switch to activate smart variant management in the global filters

bHeaderExpanded.description: Represents a switch to show smart filter bar in expanded or collapsed mode

containerLayout.description: Represents the layout of the card container

showDateInRelativeFormat.description: Represents a switch to Enable or disable Relative or Normal date formating in ovp application

disableTableCardFlexibility.description: Represents a switch to Enable or Disable the Flexibility of Table cards

enableLiveFilter.description: Represents the switch to activate live update in the global filters, else manual update will be required

refreshStrategyOnAppRestore.description: Represents the refresh strategies configured for OVP while coming back to the source app

considerAnalyticalParameters.description: Flag to enable/disable analytical parameter support for Smart filter bar

refreshIntervalInMinutes.description: Time interval in minutes to auto refresh the card models

useDateRangeType.description: Flag to enable/disable semantic date range control for Smart filter bar

chartSettings.description: Represents the object to store analytical chart settings

showDataLabel.description: Flag to enable data labels on analytical charts

filterSettings.description: Represents the object to store filter bar configuration

dateSettings.description: Represents the object to store date type filter fields configuration

useDateRange.description: Flag to enable DateTimeRange setting for date type filter fields with filter restriction interval

selectedValues.description: Represents the semantic date values selected for the date filter field

exclude.description: Flag to exclude values from the date picker

fields.description: Represents the filter field definition for each field

dataLoadSettings.description: Represents the object to define data loading behaviour for an overview page application

loadDataOnAppLaunch.description: Data load behaviour options on application launch

parentAppId.description: Represents mandatory unique app identifier of the app containing self manifest.

filterEntitySet.description: Represents the entity to use as global filter in the filter bar control

templateName.description: Represents the template name, from where manifest is generated

cardType.description: Represents the environment type of Insights card

isDtCardCopy.description: Represents the state of original or copied card

isDeletedForUser.description: Represents the deleted state for a user

visible.description: Represents the visibility type of Insights card

rank.description: Represents the display order of Insights card

versions.description: Represents UI5 and card generator middleware version.

ui5.description: Represents the version of UI5 used to generate the card.

dtMiddleware.description: Represents the version of design time card generator

sap.insights.title: JSON schema for SAP Insights Namespace

_version.description: Represents attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

configId.description: Represents ID of an application configuration

flavorId.description: Represents SAP Screen Personas Flavor ID

compatibilityMode.description: Indicates that WebDynpro Application requires Compatibility Mode, while uses legacy shell services. Possible values are true or false (default)

_version.description: Represents attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

activateFilterReduction.description: Represents a switch to activate filter reduction so that filters in OData requests can be represented as ABAP select options

activateLrep.description: Represents a switch to activate LREP as the persistence for configurations and texts

useHeadRequestForXsrfToken.description: Represents a switch to use HEAD-Requests instead of GET-Requests when fetching the XSRF-Security-Token

_version.description: Represents attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

flavorId.description: Represents SAP Screen Personas Flavor ID

_version.description: Represents attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

urlTemplateId.description: Reference to the desired URL Template

parameters.description: Represents configuration parameters which will be used by Template Engine to compile URL Template

key.description: Represents the name of the desired parameter

value.description: Represents the actual value of the desired parameter

_version.description: Represents attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

wcf-target-id.description: Represents the target technical id for a WCF Application

sap.ui.smartbusiness.app.title: JSON schema for SAP.UI.SMARTBUSINESS.APP Namespace
sap.ui.smartbusiness.app.description: Represents specific attributes for Smart Business

_version.description: Represents attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

sap.copilot.title: JSON schema for SAP.COPILOT Namespace
sap.copilot.description: Represents specific attributes for SAP CoPilot

_version.description: Represents SAP.COPILOT attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

contextAnalysis.description: Settings for the context analysis features of SAP CoPilot

allowAddingObjectsFromAppScreenToCollect.description: Enable/Disable the ability for SAP CoPilot to analyze your Application Screens and add the found objects to a Collection

whitelistedEntityTypes.description: A list of the whitelisted EntityTypes, prefixed with their namespace, that SAP CoPilot can display. The empty list is ignored, thus allowing all EntityTypes by default.

digitalAssistant.description: Settings for the Digital Assistant features of SAP CoPilot

uri.description: Represents the uri of the intent

dataSources.description: A list of the sap.app.dataSources used by the intent

i18n.description: Represents the uri of the translation file

sap.url.title: JSON schema for SAP.URL Namespace
sap.url.description: Represents specific attributes for SAP URL

_version.description: Represents attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner
Represents attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

uri.description: Represents the uri inside the SFSF app

appVersion.description: Represents the version of the SFSF application

_version.description: Represents attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

public.description: Specify if the UI can be accessed from a different space than origin development space

_version.description: Represents SAP.CARD attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

designtime.description: The path to the design time folder with assets files

configuration.description: General configuration of the card. Allows to define parameters, destinations, filters and more

destinations.description: Describes what destinations are used by the card

csrfTokens.description: Describes the CSRF tokens used by the card

actionHandlers.description: Holds configuration for the default action handlers

submit.description: Configuration for the submit action handler

messages.description: Describes the messages for the card

type.description: Represents the type of the card's content

headerPosition.description: Represents card header position - under or over the content

content.description: Represents card content attributes. Content type should be the same as card type e.g. if card type List is used the content type should also be List

extension.description: A path to an Extension implementation. It is resolved relatively to the manifest

pageSize.description: Represents the number of the items in one page

totalCount.description: Represents the total count of the items in all pages

visible.description: [Experimental] Visibility of the footer

sap.package.title: JSON schema for SAP.PACKAGE Namespace
sap.package.description: Represents general package attributes. Experimental, will be detailed in the future

_version.description: Represents SAP.PACKAGE attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

i18n.description: Represents path inside the package to the properties file containing text symbols for the packages texts

packageVersion.description: Represents mandatory semantic version of the package information and optional the upgrade notification

version.description: Represents mandatory semantic version of the package

upgradeNotification.description: Represents optional upgrade notification once the package is available. none - no notification, package will be installed automatically for any version. major - notification before a new major version is installed. major.minor - notification before a major and minor version is installed. all - notification before any new version is installed, including patches

type.description: Represents type of an package and can be card, workflow, workspace-template

title.description: Represents a title (mandatory); to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

subTitle.description: Represents a subtitle to the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

shortTitle.description: Represents a shorter version of the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

info.description: Represents additional information to the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

description.description: Represents a description; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

icon.description: Represents icon name or source URL for the package

tags.description: Represents array of keywords used to find the package

items.description: Represents the artifacts contained in the package

consumption.description: Represents list of product ids that are allowed to consume this package. if not defined all products that are capable of installing this package are allowed

items.description: Represents the id of the product that can consume this package.

dependencies.description: Represents the products and service that the pacakge depends on

products.description: List of products that this package depends on

services.description: List of services that this package depends on

_version.description: Represents SAP.ARTIFACT attributes format version. It is managed by namespace owner

i18n.description: Represents path inside the artifact to the properties file containing text symbols for the artifacts texts

artifactVersion.description: Represents mandatory semantic version of the artifact

type.description: Represents type of an artifact and can be card, workflow, workspace-template

title.description: Represents a title (mandatory); to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

subTitle.description: Represents a subtitle to the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

shortTitle.description: Represents a shorter version of the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

info.description: Represents additional information to the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

description.description: Represents a description; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

icon.description: Represents icon name or source URL for the artifact

tags.description: Represents array of keywords used to find the artifact

items.description: Represents a tag; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

semanticversion.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

contentitem.description: Represents an item of the content list defining the sub manifest and baseurl

baseURL.description: Relative url to the artifact within the folder in this package

infolink.description: Represents a link information with text and url

text.description: Represents a descriptive text for the target

lineOfBusiness.description: Represents the vendor line of business within the vendors organization if any

value.description: The actual value shown as a colored horizontal bar

displayValue.description: The value, which will be displayed as a text in the tooltip of the bar

legendTitle.description: Title, which will be displayed in the legend

color.description: The state color of the threshold

type.description: Represents the type of the Microchart

maxValue.description: The maximum scale value for the bar chart

displayValue.description: The value, which will be displayed as a text next to the bar

type.description: Represents the type of the Microchart

value.description: The actual value shown as a colored horizontal bar

minValue.description: The minimum scale value for the bar chart

maxValue.description: The maximum scale value for the bar chart

displayValue.description: The actual value, which will be displayed as a text next to the bar

target.description: The target value - displayed as a vertical line (marker)

scale.description: The scaling suffix that is appended to all values

color.description: The state color of the bar

thresholds.description: The thresholds indicators of the bar

title.description: The title of the filter option

key.description: The unique key of the filter option. Mapped to the filter's value

Configuration.BasicDataType.description: Basic data types for parameters and filters

maxAge.description: The maximum age for which the cache is considered fresh

staleWhileRevalidate.description: Should we show stale cache while revalidating

noStore.description: [Deprecated] Set to true to disable caching for this card

enabled.description: Set to false to disable caching for this card

batchRequest.description: Represents a request which is a part of a batch request

url.description: The URL to make the request to

parameters.description: Represents parameters that are passed in the actions

extension.description: [Experimental] Represents attributes, needed to get data via extension

method.description: The method of the extension, which fetches data

args.description: The arguments, with which the method will be called

service_0.description: Represents service that will be used for actions

oneOf.description: Represents name of the Service to be used for the action

name.description: Represents name of the Service to be used for the action

url.description: The URL to make the request to

parameters.description: Represents the request parameters. If it is a POST request the parameters will be put as key/value pairs into the body of the request

retryAfter.description: Number of seconds before the request is retried if it failed the previous time

timeout.description: A timeout (in milliseconds) for the request. A value of 0 means there will be no timeout.

withCredentials.description: Indicates whether cross-site requests should be made using credentials

batch.description: Map of requests to be batched

statusTextFormatter.description: Defines fields for dynamic status formatting

startDate.description: The start date of the special date. The accepted date format is ISO 8601

endDate.description: The end date of the special date. The accepted date format is ISO 8601

type.description: The type of the special date - one of the types defined in the legend

category.description: Defines which card component describes the legend item. Available categories: "calendar" (represented as square) or "appointment" (circle)

text.description: The describing information of the item

type.description: The type of the legend item corresponding with the described component

startDate.description: The start date of the item. The accepted date format is ISO 8601

endDate.description: The end date of the item. The accepted date format is ISO 8601

title.description: The title of the item

text.description: The additional information of the item

type.description: The type of the item - one of the types defined in the legend

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the item

path.description: Defines the path to the structure holding the data about the specialDates
Defines the path to the structure holding the data about the legendItems
Defines the path to the structure holding the data about the items

title.description: Represents a title of the column; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

width.description: Defines the width of the column

hAlign.description: Defines the horizontal alignment of the column content

value.description: Represents the text value of the column

state.description: Defines the state of the column

target.description: [Deprecated] Specifies where to open the 'url', if it is provided

visible.description: Represents the visibility state of the column

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the group item

ContentType.Object.Item.IconGroupIcon.description: Definition for icons in the IconGroup

src.description: Represents icon name or source URL

text.description: [Deprecated] Represents text that will be displayed in the icon

initials.description: Used as fallback if the 'src' property is not set or there is an issue with the resource. Up to two Latin letters can be displayed

alt.description: Represents text that will be displayed as a tooltip

type.description: Defines the validation type

required.description: Defines whether the user input is required

minLength.description: Defines the minimum number of characters

maxLength.description: Defines the maximum number of characters

restrictToPredefinedOptions.description: Defines whether the value is restricted to predefined options

pattern.description: Sets the regular expression pattern that should match the value

validate.description: An extension function used to validate the value

title.description: The title of the option

key.description: The unique key of the option. Mapped to the input's value

ContentType.Object.Item.IconGroupTemplat.description: Template definition for the icons in the group

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the icon

ContentType.Object.Item.MainIndicator.description: Represents the main numeric indicator of the NumericData

number.description: The value of the main indicator

unit.description: The unit of the main indicator

state.description: The state color of the main indicator

oneOf.description: The state color of the main indicator

target_0.description: Specifies where to open an URL

ContentType.Object.Item.description: Represents a single item of information. It can contain label, value and image

icon.description: Defines the icon of the item

label.description: Defines the label of the item

value.description: Represents the text, which is associated with the label

tooltip.description: Defines the tooltip of the link

type.description: Defines the type of the displayed information. Some of the types are deprecated

url.description: [Deprecated] Defines the URL string. Works only with items of type 'link'

target.description: [Deprecated] Specifies the target of the link - it works like the target property of the HTML 'a' tag. Works only with items of type 'link'

emailSubject.description: [Deprecated] Represents the subject of the email. Works only with item of type 'email'

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the group item

visible.description: Represents the visibility state of the item

sideIndicators.description: [Experimental] Multiple side indicators that relate to the main numeric indicator

sideIndicatorsAlignment.description: [Experimental] The alignment of the side indicators

template.description: [Experimental] Template definition for the icons in the group

path.description: [Experimental] Binding path to the icon data

size.description: [Experimental] The size of the icons in an IconGroup

details.description: Represents additional information about the numeric indicators

state.description: The state color of the item

showStateIcon.description: Defines if a default state icon is shown

selectedKey.description: Defines the initially selected key from the given options for ComboBox.

path.description: Defines the path to the structure holding the data about the items

maxValue.description: The number of displayed symbols for RatingIndicator

visualMode.description: Defines how float values are visualized for RatingIndicator: Full (values are rounded to the nearest integer value (e.g. 1.7 -> 2)) or  Half (values are rounded to the nearest half value (e.g. 1.7 -> 1.5))

ContentType.Object.Group.description: Represents a group of information for an object

title.description: Represents a title of the object group; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

titleMaxLines.description: [Experimental] Limits the number of lines for wrapping the group title.

labelWrapping.description: [Experimental] Determines whether the labels of the group items will be wrapped.

visible.description: Represents the visibility state of the group

src.description: Represents icon name or source URL

visible.description: Represents the visibility state of the icon

title.description: The title of the timeline item

description.description: The description of the timeline item

dateTime.description: The dateTime value of the timeline item

owner.description: The owner of the timeline item

ownerImage.description: The owner image of the timeline item

icon.description: The icon of the timeline item

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the item level

type.description: The type of the feed

values.description: The names of the measures or dimensions that are used for this feed

displayValue.description: Display value for the dimension. It doesn't work with 'waterfallType'

dataType.description: Data type of the dimension as displayed in the chart. Currently only in time series chart, it is required to set data type to 'date' if this column is going to feed the 'timeAxis'

ContentType.Analytical.AxisText.description: Represents descriptive text of the axis

visible.description: Represents the visibility state of the descriptive axis text

ContentType.Analytical.DataLabel.description: Represents value attributes in the plot area

visible.description: Visibility of the data labels

showTotal.description: Visibility of data label for total value in some charts

visible.description: Defines whether the legend will be visible

position.description: Defines where the legend will be positioned

alignment.description: Defines how the legend will be aligned

src.description: Represents icon name or source URL

shape.description: Represents the shape of the icon

title.description: The title of the group

order.description: The order by which the group will be sorted

attributesLayoutType.description: Defines the layout type of the attributes

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the item

number.description: Represents value of the side indicator

unit.description: The unit of the main indicator

src.description: Represents icon name or source URL

shape.description: Represents the shape of the icon

text.description: [Deprecated] Initials for the avatar. Up to 2 symbols. If the image provided to the 'src' property fails to load, then the text will be shown

initials.description: Used as fallback if the 'src' property is not set or there is an issue with the resource. Up to two Latin letters can be displayed

visible.description: Visibility of the icon

action.description: Represents actions that can be applied on card elements

type.description: The type of the action

enabled.description: Represents the state of the action

url.description: Represents the URL that will be used as navigation target if no service is provided

target.description: Specifies where to open the 'url', if it is provided

type.description: Represents the type of the header

title.description: Represents a title of the header; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

titleMaxLines.description: [Experimental] Limit the number of lines for the title.

subTitle.description: Represents a subtitle to the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

subTitleMaxLines.description: [Experimental] Limit the number of lines for the sub title.

actions.description: Represents a description of the actions that can be applied on a part of a card

unitOfMeasurement.description: Represents unit of measurement for the whole numeric header

sideIndicatorsAlignment.description: The alignment of the side indicators

details.description: Represents additional information about the numeric header

detailsMaxLines.description: [Experimental] Limit the number of lines for the details text.

sideIndicators.description: Multiple side indicators that relate to the main numeric indicator

status.description: Represents the status of the card

visible.description: [Experimental] Visibility of the header

type.description: Represents the type of the header

title.description: Represents a title of the header; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

subTitle.description: Represents a subtitle to the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

actions.description: Represents a description of the actions that can be applied on a part of a card

icon.description: Represents the icon of the card

status.description: Represents the status of the card

visible.description: [Experimental] Visibility of the header

ContentType.WebPage.description: WebPage content is used to embed HTML page

src.description: URL of the web page to be embedded

ContentType.Calendar.description: The calendar card is used to display a schedule of a single entity (such as person, resource) for a selected time interval

date.description: The initial date of the calendar which appointments are initially shown. The accepted date format is ISO 8601

noItemsText.description: The text shown when there are no items for the selected day

moreItems.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the button showing there are more items than the shown

actions.description: Represents an action that can be applied on he button showing there are more items than the shown

ContentType.Component.description: Represents the configuration for a component card's content

groups.description: Represents groups of information for an object

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the content
Defines actions that can be applied on the item

minItems.description: Represents the minimum expected number of items
Represents the minimum expected number of items

ContentType.AnalyticsCloud.description: Represents SAP Analytics Cloud content attributes

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the content

title.description: [Deprecated] Represents title attributes

visible.description: Represents the visibility state of the title

measureAxis.description: [Deprecated] Represents the value set for measure axis

dimensionAxis.description: [Deprecated] Represents the value set for dimension axis

actions.description: Defines actions that can be applied on the content

popover.description: Configuration for a popover, which will open while pressing chart points

active.description: Whether the popover is connected to the chart. If it's not it won't open

minItems.description: Represents the minimum expected number of items

actions.description: Action(s) which will be executed when button is pressed

type.description: The type of the item

ariaHasPopup.description: Use this property only when the item is related to a popover/popup

visible.description: Determines whether the item is visible

path.description: The path from the JSON to be used as root

json.description: The data to be used directly. Without making requests

updateInterval.description: Represents interval in seconds, after which a new data request will be triggered

extension.description: [Experimental] Provides a way to request data via extension

name.description: [Experimental] Gives a name to the data section. A model with the same name will be assigned to the card

Configuration.NoData.description: Represents a configuration for a NoData

title.description: Title shown in the illustrated message of the card

description.description: Description shown in the illustrated message of the card

size.description: Defines the size predefined from sap.m.IllustratedMessage

type.description: Defines the image predefined from sap.m.IllustratedMessage

Configuration.CSRFToken.description: Represents a configuration for a CSRF token

Configuration.Destinations.description: Represents a configuration for a cloud platform destination

name.description: The name of the destination. Use the same name which is used in Cloud Platform

label.description: Label for the destination for user-friendly visualization in the design-time editor

description.description: Description of the destination for user-friendly visualization in the design-time editor

defaultUrl.description: A default url which will be used if there is no Host associated with the card

type.description: The type of the filter

label.description: Label for the filter. Used by screen readers

visible.description: Determines whether the filter is visible

label.description: Label for the filter. Used by screen readers

options.description: Options that will appear in the dropdown

visible.description: Determines whether the filter is visible

type.description: The type of the filter

path.description: Defines the path to the structure holding the data about the items

visible.description: Determines whether the filter is visible

type.description: The type of the value for the parameter

label.description: Label for the parameter for user-friendly visualization in the design-time editor

description.description: Description of the parameter for user-friendly visualization in the design-time editor

dataSource.description: Represents reference to dataSource under sap.app

path.description: Represents path to the title collection

retrieveStreams.description: Represents indicator whether streams should be retrieved

levelsDef.description: Plot area is a parent property which defines multiple other properties for smoothness and marker size

resizableLayoutVariantCardProperties.description: Represents the card properties is a layout variant

visible.description: Represents the visibility of the card

customActionsSetting.description: Represents the properties for the custom actions in the Quick View Cards

text.description: Text displayed for extended actions in Quick View

press.description: Name of the press handler for extended actions in Quick View

position.description: Position of extended actions in Quick View

timeAxisDef.description: Represents the configuration to customize the time axis

plotAreaDef.description: Plot area is a parent property which defines multiple other properties for smoothness and marker size

isSmoothed.description: Represents whether smoother curves are required or not

markerSize.description: Represents the size of the markers in scatter plots

dataLabel.description: dataLabel is a parent property that defines other properties for type

type.description: Defines whether to display percentage values or actual counts in the donut chart

objectStreamCardsSettingsDef.description: Represents the Object Stream properties - properties that are passed to the Object Stream cards

showFirstActionInFooter.description: Represents the flag to show first action in footer of the Quickview cards

customActions.description: Represents the custom actions in the Quick View Cards

defaultSpanDef.description: Represents the card default grid size in columns and rows

cols.description: Represents the number of the number of grid columns

rows.description: Represents the number of the number of grid rows

showOnlyHeader.description: Represents if user wants to show only header part of card in resizable layout

minimumTitleRow.description: If user wants to show more text in title then he/she can configure no of lines to be shown in title(Maximum allowed 3 lines)

minimumSubTitleRow.description: If user wants to show more text in title then he/she can configure no of lines to be shown in sub-title(Maximum allowed 2 lines)

tab_setting.description: Represents the tab specific properties - properties that are passed to a particular tab in a card

dataPointAnnotationPath.description: Represents the data point annotation path

dynamicSubtitleAnnotationPath.description: Represents the dynamic subtitle annotation path

value.description: Represents the drop down value to be shown

chartProperties.description: This property is responsible for setting specific chart settings

colorPalette.description: Represents the configuration to customize the column stacked chart

card_setting.description: Represents the card specific properties - properties that are passed to the card

category.description: Represents the category of the card- used in the card header

itemText.description: Represents the user defined string in placeholder card

title.description: Represents language-dependent title of the card - used in the card header

subTitle.description: Represents language-dependent subtitle of the card - used in the card header

valueSelectionInfo.description: Represents things like people, number of items

entitySet.description: Represents the entity set that will be displayed in this card

staticContent.description: Represents the static content that will be displayed in this card

listFlavor.description: Represents the flavor of the list to use in this card. The flavor can be bar chart, carousel or standard

listType.description: Represents the type of list to use for this card. The list can be extended to display more information or condensed to take up less space on the card

sortBy.description: Represents the sort key for the entity set

sortOrder.description: Represents the sort order for the entity set

dataPointAnnotationPath.description: Represents the data point annotation path

selectionPresentationAnnotationPath.description: Represents the selection presentation annotation path

dynamicSubtitleAnnotationPath.description: Represents the dynamic subtitle annotation path

ignoreSapText.description: Represents the flag to indicate priority of number formatting over sap text

enableAddToInsights.description: Represents the flag to enable/disable individual card's functionality to add them to insight

requireAppAuthorization.description: Represents the cards for which authorization is required

enableLocaleCurrencyFormatting.description: Represents the flag to indicate the use of object number/smart field

navigation.description: Represents the configuration to alter the navigation mode in OVP Analytical Cards

showFilterInHeader.description: Represents a switch to Show or Hide Filters in Cards Headers in OVP application

showSortingInHeader.description: Represents a switch to Show or Hide Sorting in Cards Headers in OVP application

imageSupported.description: Flag for enabling images in a condensed list card

showLineItemDetail.description: Flag for show line item detail in list and table card

showLabelText.description: This property is responsible for showing and hiding text labels on the geo spots

customParams.description: This property is responsible for passing custom parameters present in the entity set to the navigating application

chartProperties.description: This property is responsible for setting specific chart settings

colorPalette.description: Represents the configuration to customize the column stacked chart

sequencePos.description: Represents the position of the card in the sequence

model.description: Represents the model for the card

template.description: Represents the card component path to use for this card

tabs.description: Represents the card with view switch control

filterFieldName.description: Represents the configuration object for each date filter field

defaultValue.description: Represents the configuration for setting default value for the date filter field

operation.description: Represents the default semantic date value to be set on the filter field

selectedValues.description: Represents the semantic date values selected for the date filter field

customDateRangeImplementation.description: Represents the custom implementation for semantic date filter field

exclude.description: Flag to exclude values from the date picker

entitySets.description: Represents the map of entity sets configured for refresh strategies

componentName.description: Represents the name of the component to be loaded inside the canvas

componentUsage.description: Represents the reference to the name of the componentUsages defined in sap.ui5/componentUsages for the component to be loaded inside the canvas

routeName.description: Represents the name of the route

noOData.description: Represents the switch to indicate, that this route is not related to the OData service

binding.description: Represents the binding string to indicate, how the page should be bound relative to the predecessor page or absolute

headerTitle.description: Represents the the title to be shown on the page

typeImageUrl.description: Represents the URL pointing to an icon, that will be shown in the navigation menu additional to the title to represent the page

noKey.description: Represents the switch to indicate, whether this route is reached via a 1:1 navigation or a 1:n navigation

semanticKey.description: Name of a semantic key field which can be used to identify an instance of this page. Only relevant if nKey is false.

display.description: Represents an action triggered by the user on UI: the navigation to display an object

create.description: Represents an action triggered by the user on UI: the navigation to create an object

edit.description: Represents an action triggered by the user on UI: the navigation to edit an object

list.description: Switch to create a route for a list (aggregation) if true and routing for an entity if not set or false

component_binding_def.description: Represents a binding string to indicate, how the reuse component should be bound relative to the containing page or absolute

component_setting_def.description: Represents the settings specific to one component

id.description: Represents an unique id for the instance of the reuse component inside of the object page

title.description: Represents the title for the content of the reuse component

binding.description: Represents an optional element binding  for the ComponentContainer that hosts the reuse component

settings.description: Represents a map to populate the API of the reuse component

hiddenByDefault.description: Flag, whether the embedded component should be hidden by default

groupTitle.description: Represents group title of reuse components

leadingSectionIdOrPath.description: Represents a section that behaves a leading section for the group

componentName.description: Represents the name of the reuse component

componentUsage.description: Represents the reference to the name of the componentUsages defined in sap.ui5/componentUsages

path.description: Represents the path in the manifest to the target to which the navigation is bound

target.description: Represents the pointer to a semantic object

refreshStrategyOnAppRestore.description: Represents the refresh strategies configured for external display navigation while coming back to the source app

navigationProperty.description: Represents the navigation property that leads to this page. The navigation links of the previous page (the page that calls this one) are determined through this property

entitySet.description: Represents the entity set that defines either the aggregation or the root object of the component

component.description: Represents the component and its settings that makes the page

embeddedComponents.description: Represent reuse components that should be appended at the end of the template component

implementingComponent.description: Represents the component to be loaded inside the canvas if sap.suite.ui.generic.template.Canvas is used as component name, and its settings

defaultLayoutType.description: Default layout used to open the corresponding page in FlexibleColumnLayout

defaultLayoutTypeIfExternalNavigation.description: Default layout used to open the corresponding page in FlexibleColumnLayout when reached via external navigation

navigationProperty.description: Represents the navigation property that leads to this page. The navigation links of the previous page (the page that calls this one) are determined through this property

entitySet.description: Represents the entity set that defines either the aggregation or the root object of the component

component.description: Represents the component and its settings that makes the page

embeddedComponents.description: Represent reuse components that should be appended at the end of the template component

defaultLayoutType.description: Default layout used to open the corresponding page in FlexibleColumnLayout

defaultLayoutTypeIfExternalNavigation.description: Default layout used to open the corresponding page in FlexibleColumnLayout when reached via external navigation

setting_def.description: Represents global settings for the application controller

routeTargetObject.description: Represents the definition of a target of a route as object.

name.description: Represents the name of the routing target

prefix.description: The prefix of the routing target

propagateTitle.description: Indicates whether this 'Component' target should propagate it's title to this component or not

routeWithoutName.description: Represents the definition of route without the option 'name'. This is used when routes are defined in an object.

pattern.description: Represents the url pattern that the route is matched against

greedy.description: Whether the route should be matched when another route is already matched

target.description: Represents one or multiple names of targets which are displayed when the route is matched

titleTarget.description: Represents the name of the target where the 'title' information should be taken

route.description: Represents the definition of each route

name.description: Represents the name of the route

target.description: Represents the definition of each target

title.description: Represents the information which is included as a parameter of the 'titleChanged' event fired on Router when this target is displayed. The title can be set with static text and can also be set with a valid property binding syntax which will be resolved under the scope of the view in the target where the title property is defined.

viewType.description: Represents the type of view that is going to be created

targetParent.description: Represents the id of the view that contains the control specified by the 'controlId'

controlId.description: Represents the id of the control where you want to place the view created by the target

controlAggregation.description: Represents the name of an aggregation of the controlId that contains the views

clearControlAggregation.description: Whether the aggregation of the control should be cleared before adding the view

parent.description: Represents the name of another target which will also be displayed once this target is displayed

viewLevel.description: Represents the level of the current view which is used to define the transition direction when navigate to this view

transition.description: Represents the type of transition when navigating from previous view to this view

transitionParameters.description: Represents the transition parameters that are passed to the event handlers

routeTarget.description: Represents the definition of a target of a route.

defaultBindingMode.description: Represents default binding mode and must be a string value from sap.ui.model.BindingMode. Possible values: Default, OneTime, OneWay, TwoWay

bundleUrl.description: Represents the URL for the resource bundle

bundleUrlRelativeTo.description: Indicates whether url is relative to component (default) or manifest

supportedLocales.description: Represents the list of supported locales

terminologies.description: Represents terminologies with additional properties files

enhanceWith.description: Represents enhancement of UI5 resource model with additional properties files

rootView_def.description: Represents the root view definition being either the name of the view or the view definition object

viewName.description: Represents the name of the view

type.description: Represents the type of the view. Possible Values: XML, JSON, JS, HTML, Template

id.description: Represents the id of the view

async.description: Configure the targets for asynchronous loading

config.description: Represents the default properties defined for route and target

async.description: Indicates whether the Views in routing are loaded asyncly

propagateTitle.description: Indicates whether the targets which have type 'Component' should propagate their title to this component or not

bypassed.description: Represents information about targets to display when no route is matched

target.description: Represents one or multiple names of targets that are displayed when no route is matched

viewPath.description: Represents a prefix that is prepended in front of the viewName

oneOf.description: Represents the definition of routes by providing an array with elements which contain the configuration for each route
Represents the definition of routes by providing an object with the route's name as the key and other route options in an object as the value

viewId.description: Represents the id of the created view

shortcut.description: A string describing a shortcut key combination that, when used by the user, will trigger the command.
shortcut.patternTransformCode: ''.split('').map(function(char) { console.log(char);  if (/[a-z]/i.test(char)) { return `[${char.toUpperCase()}${char.toLowerCase()}]`; } else { return char; } } ).join('')

bundleUrl.description: Represents property url for model enhancement

bundleUrlRelativeTo.description: Indicates whether url is relative to component (default) or manifest

supportedLocales.description: Represents the list of supported locales

terminologies.description: Represents terminologies with additional properties files

supportedLocales.description: Represents the list of supported locales

terminologies.description: Represents terminologies with additional properties files

supportedLocales.description: Represents the list of supported locales

bundleUrl.description: Represents the URL for the resource bundle

bundleUrlRelativeTo.description: Indicates whether url is relative to component (default) or manifest

supportedLocales.description: Represents the list of supported locales

service.description: Represents the definition of each service

factoryName.description: Represents the name of the service factory

optional.description: Indicates whether the service optional or not

type.description: Represents model class name

dataSource.description: Represents string of key/alias from sap.app dataSources to reference an existing data source

preload.description: Indicates that the model will be immediately created after the manifest is loaded by Component Factory and before the Component instance is created

minVersion.description: Represents minimal version of ui5 component

lazy.description: Represents Indicator to lazy loading component

minVersion.description: Represents minimal version of ui5 library

lazy.description: Represents Indicator to lazy loading lib

componentData.description: Represents component data for the Component

lazy.description: Represents Indicator to lazy loading component usage, default true

deviceType.description: Represents device types on which the app is running

desktop.description: Represents indicator whether desktop device is supported, default true

tablet.description: Represents indicator whether tablet device is supported, default true

phone.description: Represents indicator whether phone device is supported, default true

value.description: Represents a depending on format either a verbatim default value or a reference

format.description: Indicates how 'value' is to be interpreted: ('plain': the 'value' is taken as a literal string value| 'reference': the 'value' is a reference to e.g. a UserDefault parameter (e.g. 'UserDefault.CostCenter'), the resolved parameter value is used)

filter.description: Represents a filter , only if input parameter matches filter

value.description: Represents a depending on format either a verbatim filter value, a regular expression or a reference

format.description: Indicates how 'value' is to be interpreted: ('plain': the actual value must match the 'value' property directly| 'regexp': the 'value' represents a regexp which must be present in the actual value| 'reference' : the 'value' represents a reference to e.g. a UserDefault parameter (e.g. 'UserDefault.CostCenter'), the resolved parameter value is then directly compared with the actual value)

launcherValue.description: Represents a value to be used when creating a tile intent for this inbound

oneOf.description: Represents the definition of a single-value tile intent parameter; format property must be 'plain' in this case
Represents the definition of a multi-value tile intent parameter; format property must be 'array' in this case

format.description: Indicates how 'value' is to be interpreted: 'plain': the 'value' is taken as a literal string value | 'array': the 'value' is an array of strings

prompt.description: DEPRECATED - Indicates the administrator should be prompted to supply a value when creating a tile

renameTo.description: Represents the parameter name in legacy ABAP application, e.g. 'RF05L-BUKRS' for parameter 'CompanyCode'

additionalParameters.description: Indicates how additional parameters to the declared signature are treated: ('ignored': parameters are not passed on to application | 'allowed': parameters are passed on to application | 'notallowed': additional parameters are not allowed)

uri.description: Represents the uri of the data source, should always be given in lower case

type.description: Represents type of the data source. The supported types are OData, ODataAnnotation, INA, XML, JSON, FHIR, WebSocket, http

settings.description: Represents data source type specific attributes (key, value pairs)

customType.description: Represents a custom data source type flag. So the type can be any string if its true, and only enum values if false

uri.description: Represents uri of the data source

type.description: Represents type of the data source. The supported types are OData, ODataAnnotation, INA, XML, JSON, FHIR, WebSocket, http

settings.description: Represents data source type specific attributes (key, value pairs)

odataVersion.description: Represents version of OData: 2.0 is default

localUri.description: Represents path to local meta data document or annotation uri

annotations.description: Represents  array of annotation which references an existing data source of type ODataAnnotation

maxAge.description: Indicates that the client is unwilling to accept a response whose age is greater than the number of seconds specified in this field

objects.description: Dictionary of (catalog) objects offered by the datasource

additionalProperties.description: A (catalog) object of an InA DataSource

ignoreAnnotationsFromMetadata.description: Indicates whether annotations from metadata should be ignored

action.description: Represents the action to perform on the business entity (e.g., 'display')

additionalParameters.description: Indicates whether the intent can contain additional context parameters that are not described in the outbound: ('notallowed': the intent must contain only the specified parameters | 'allowed': additional parameters might appear in the navigation intent)| 'ignored': technical meta-parameters for framework usage are added to the intent, these parameters should be ignored by target applications

value.description: Describes parameters of navigation intents generated or triggered by the application

Represents a verbatim value (when 'plain' format is used), a pattern (when 'regexp' format is used), a value coming from a UI5 model (when 'binding' format is used), or a User Default reference (when 'reference' format is used)

format.description: Indicates how 'value' is to be interpreted: 'plain': the 'value' is taken as a literal string value | 'reference': the 'value' is a reference to a parameter maintained in the Fiori Launchpad (e.g. 'UserDefault.CostCenter'); the parameter value is used on the outbound intent parameter| 'regexp': the 'value' matches the specified pattern| 'binding': the 'value' is a binding path; the value from the model at the specified binding path will be used on the outbound intent parameter

action.description: Represents action an the semantic object

hideLauncher.description: Indicates to not expose this inbound as a tile or link

title.description: Represents a title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

subTitle.description: Represents a subtitle; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

shortTitle.description: Represents a shorter version of the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

info.description: Represents additional information to the title; to make this property language dependent (recommended), use a key in double curly brackets '{{key}}'

displayMode.description: Represents the display mode of the tile

deviceTypes.description: Represents device types for which application is developed

name.description: Represents a name of the open source as appears on the web

version.description: Represents a version of the open source (if part of app, version must be specified, if part of UI5 dist layer, version is empty)

packagedWithMySelf.description: Indicates, whether it is part of the app or not

bundleUrl.description: Represents property url for model enhancement

bundleUrlRelativeTo.description: Indicates whether url is relative to component (default) or manifest

supportedLocales.description: Represents the list of supported locales

terminologies.description: Represents terminologies with additional properties files

supportedLocales.description: Represents the list of supported locales

terminologies.description: Represents terminologies with additional properties files
